mapper.select: select rb.id, rb.post_id, u.id, u.user_name as writer_name, u.user_role, p.title, rb.reporter_id, (select user_name from user_tb where id = rb.reporter_id) as reporter_name, rb.report_count, rb.report_date from post p join (select max(id) as id, max(post_id) as post_id, max(reporter_id) as reporter_id, max(report_date) as report_date, count(post_id) as report_count from report_board group by post_id) as rb on rb.post_id = p.id join user_tb u on u.id = p.user_id order by report_date desc, report_count desc
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM report_board GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 1;

select rb.id, rb.post_id, u.id, u.user_name as writer_name, u.user_role, p.title, rb.reporter_id, (select user_name from user_tb where id = rb.reporter_id) as reporter_name, rb.report_count, rb.report_date from post p join (select max(id) as id, max(post_id) as post_id, max(reporter_id) as reporter_id, max(report_date) as report_date, count(post_id) as report_count from report_board group by post_id) as rb on rb.post_id = p.id join user_tb u on u.id = p.user_id order by report_date desc, report_count desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
